M

P

PositionsByUserAndDateJSON - Class in server.web.resources.json
The Class PositionsByUserAndDateJSON defines Web resource to get all positions of an user, specified by his username in the URI, added in a range defined by an initial date and a final date (HTTP method GET).
PositionsByUserAndDateJSON() - Constructor for class server.web.resources.json.PositionsByUserAndDateJSON
 
PositionsByUserJSON - Class in server.web.resources.json
The Class PositionsByUserJSON defines Web resources to get positions by user (HTTP method GET) and to add a position (HTTP method POST).
PositionsByUserJSON() - Constructor for class server.web.resources.json.PositionsByUserJSON

Instantiates a position with empty fields.
Posizione(IdPosizione, Utente, float) - Constructor for class commons.Posizione
Instantiates a position with a specified position id, user, accuracy.

U

UserAuthJSON - Class in server.web.resources.json
The Class UserAuthJSON defines Web resources (HTTP method GET) to get all usernames of the registered users.
UserAuthJSON() - Constructor for class server.web.resources.json.UserAuthJSON
 
UserRegistry - Class in server.backend
The Class UserRegistry is a back-end class for managing data on the server.
UserRegistry() - Constructor for class server.backend.UserRegistry
Instantiates a new user registry that creates an instance of the GestoriDatiPersistenti class and takes care of loading the data from the database.
UserRegistryAPI - Class in server.backend.wrapper
The Class UserRegistryAPI is a wrapper class of the User Registry class and defines an API to interact with the server backend.
UserRegistryWebApplication - Class in server.web.frontend
The Class UserRegistryWebApplication defines the front-end class for setting server configuration and its running.
UserRegistryWebApplication() - Constructor for class server.web.frontend.UserRegistryWebApplication
 
UserRegJSON - Class in server.web.resources.json
The Class UserRegJSON defines Web resources to sign a new user (HTTP method POST) and to authenticate a user (HTTP method PUT).
UserRegJSON() - Constructor for class server.web.resources.json.UserRegJSON
 
Utente - Class in commons
The Class Utente represents the abstraction of a user.
Utente() - Constructor for class commons.Utente
Instantiates a user with empty fields.
Utente(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class commons.Utente
Instantiates a user with a specified username, password, email, nome, cognome.

V

verifier - Static variable in class server.web.frontend.UserRegistryWebApplication
The Constant verifier that contains all credentials of registered users for authentication.
